description:
Use time energy to bounce off walls and ceilings in every direction, defeating enemies with combos!
Multiple endings with scenario branching depending on the choices you make along the way!
What future will you choose when you find out the true reason why the world was destroyed?
name: METAL NINJA
intro:
Stop the time, and Go.
New style 2D scrolling action game.
Ninja who came from 2036 to save the world.
